TopicTitle: Does anyone know what mod lets you transfer science between modules?

Articles.Content: I had crew manifest once upon a .23.5 ago and was able to transfer science thru crew manifest. Now in .25 I have the latest crew manifest, but no science transfer. Im thinking maybe I had another mod you need to do science thru CM? Does anyone know the mod?

Yes, the one I know if is ship manifest:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62270-0-25-0-Ship-Manifest-%28Crew-Science-Resources%29-v0-25-0_3-3-2b-28-Oct-14

Yes, the one I know if is ship manifest:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62270-0-25-0-Ship-Manifest-%28Crew-Science-Resources%29-v0-25-0_3-3-2b-28-Oct-14

thanks! that was it! hey will this conflict with crew manifest?

LOL I'm so confused you said you had that and asked for some other mod and he posted what you said you had hehe so confused.

EDIT- O now, I'm better boy them names are too close lol had me confused.

Edited November 20, 2014 by Mecripp2

thanks! that was it! hey will this conflict with crew manifest?

you don't need crew manifest if you use ship manifest. it has the crew transfer funcionality too.

LOL I'm so confused you said you had that and asked for some other mod and he posted what you said you had hehe so confused.

No, lextacy said he has Crew Manifest. Leszek suggested Ship Manifest. The names are nearly identical but they are different mods.

Ship Manifest can do a lot more than Crew Manifest. But in my opinion it doesn't do a particularly good job. And there are a few things Crew Manifest does that Ship Manifest does not.
